title: Resource timing
post:
{{Sidebar("Glossary")}}

Diagnosing performance issues requires performance data at the granularity of the resource. The [Resource Timing API](/blog/Web/API/Performance_API/Resource_timing) is a JavaScript API that is able to capture timing information for each individual resource that is fetched when a page is loaded.

- [Using the resource timing API](/blog/Web/API/Performance_API/Resource_timing)
